justification: “Childhood socioeconomic position was measured by participants' self-report responses to a survey question asking them to assess their financial circumstances growing up… Responses were then coded on a 5-point Likert scale.”

“Recent economic change was measured subjectively… The question asked, ‘Overall, and considering the global pandemic, how did your financial situation change during 2020?’ … Responses were coded on a 5-point Likert scale.”

measured_by: Temporal Discounting Task with adjusting binary choice sets (TD score)
justification: “To assess temporal discounting, participants were presented with a series of hypothetical, adjusting binary choice sets… an overall temporal discounting score (TD score) was constructed for each participant.”
